00027 GarminLinkLayer * GarminLinkLayer::getInstance()
00028 {
00029     if( sInstance == NULL )
00030     {
00031         sInstance = new GarminLinkLayer();
00032         atexit( GarminLinkLayer::destroyInstance );
00033     }
00034     return sInstance;
00035 }

00037 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //----------------------------------------------------------------------

00041 {
00042     delete sInstance;
00043     sInstance = NULL;
00044 }

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 GarminLinkLayer::GarminLinkLayer()
00050 {
00051     mFifo.size      = FIFO_SIZE;
00052     mFifo.head      = 0;
00053     mFifo.tail      = 0;
00054 
00055     setPhysicalLayer( SerialPort::getInstance() );
00056     mPhysicalLayer->setLinkLayer( this );
00057 }

00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 void GarminLinkLayer::rx
00067     (
00068     uint8  const * const aData,
00069     uint32         const aSize
00070     )
00071 {
00072     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00073     Local Variables
00074     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00075     uint8          *ptr;
00076     uint32          i;
00077 
00078 
00079     ptr = (uint8 *)aData;
00080 
00081     for( i = 0; i < aSize; i++ )
00082     {
00083         mFifo.buffer[ mFifo.tail ] = ptr[ i ];
00084         mFifo.tail = ( mFifo.tail >= ( mFifo.size - 1 ) ) ? 0 : mFifo.tail + 1;
00085     }
00086 
00087     // now frame the packets
00088     while( getPacketFromFifo() );
00089 }   /* rx() */
00090 
00091 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 int GarminLinkLayer::numBytesInFifo()
00098 {
00099     if( mFifo.tail >= mFifo.head )
00100     {
00101         return( mFifo.tail - mFifo.head );
00102     }
00103     else
00104     {
00105         return( ( mFifo.size - mFifo.head ) + mFifo.tail );
00106     }
00107 }   /* numBytesInFifo() */
00108 
00109 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 bool GarminLinkLayer::getPacketFromFifo()
00129 {
00130     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00131     Local Variables
00132     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00133     uint32                              fifoSize;
00134     header_type                         header;
00135     footer_type                         footer;
00136     uint32                              prevHead;
00137     uint32                              payloadStart;
00138     uint32                              payloadEnd;
00139     uint8                               checksum;
00140     uint8                              *ptr;
00141     GarminPacket                       *packet;
00142 
00143     //loop until Garmin back found or FIFO empty
00144     while( mFifo.head != mFifo.tail )
00145     {
00146         prevHead    = mFifo.head;
00147         fifoSize    = numBytesInFifo();
00148         if( fifoSize < MIN_PACKET_SIZE ) return false;
00149 
00150         getDataFromFifo( (uint8 *)&header, SIZE_OF_HEADER );
00151 
00152         //find header
00153         if( ( header.dle != ID_DLE_BYTE ) ||
00154             ( header.id  == ID_ETX_BYTE ) )
00155         {
00156             incrementHead( 1 );
00157             continue;
00158         }
00159         //find footer
00160         incrementHead( SIZE_OF_HEADER );
00161         payloadStart = mFifo.head;
00162         payloadEnd = payloadStart;
00163         while( mFifo.head != mFifo.tail )
00164         {
00165             fifoSize = numBytesInFifo();
00166             if( fifoSize < SIZE_OF_FOOTER )
00167             {
00168                 break;
00169             }
00170 
00171             getDataFromFifo( (uint8*)&footer, SIZE_OF_FOOTER );
00172             if( ( footer.dle == ID_DLE_BYTE ) &&
00173                 ( footer.etx == ID_DLE_BYTE ) )
00174             {
00175                 incrementHead( 2 );
00176             }
00177             else if( ( footer.dle == ID_DLE_BYTE ) &&
00178                      ( footer.etx == ID_ETX_BYTE ) )
00179             {
00180                 payloadEnd = mFifo.head;
00181                 break;
00182             }
00183             else
00184                 incrementHead( 1 );
00185         }
00186         //if footer not found, entire packet not received yet
00187         if( payloadStart == payloadEnd )
00188         {
00189             mFifo.head = prevHead;
00190             return false;
00191         }
00192 
00193         //complete packet exists in receive queue
00194         packet = new GarminPacket;
00195         mFifo.head = payloadStart;
00196         packet->mPacketId = header.id;
00197         packet->mPayloadSize = header.size;
00198         if( packet->mPayloadSize == ID_DLE_BYTE )
00199         {
00200             incrementHead( 1 );
00201         }
00202         packet->mFrameSize = 0;
00203         packet->mChecksum = ( header.id + header.size ) % 256;
00204 
00205         ptr = (uint8*)packet->mPayload;
00206 
00207         while( ( mFifo.head != payloadEnd )
00208             && ( packet->mFrameSize < packet->mPayloadSize ) )
00209         {
00210             getDataFromFifo( (uint8*)&ptr[packet->mFrameSize], 2 );
00211             packet->mChecksum = ( ptr[ packet->mFrameSize] + packet->mChecksum ) % 256;
00212             incrementHead( 1 );
00213             if( ( ptr[ packet->mFrameSize     ] == ID_DLE_BYTE ) &&
00214                 ( ptr[ packet->mFrameSize + 1 ] == ID_DLE_BYTE ) )
00215                 incrementHead( 1 );
00216             packet->mFrameSize++;
00217         }
00218 
00219         getDataFromFifo( (uint8*)&checksum, 1 );
00220         packet->mChecksum = ( checksum + packet->mChecksum ) % 256;
00221         if( checksum == ID_DLE_BYTE )
00222         {
00223             incrementHead( 2 );
00224         }
00225         else
00226         {
00227             incrementHead( 1 );
00228         }
00229 
00230         packet->mFrameSize = 0;
00231         while( prevHead != mFifo.tail )
00232         {
00233             packet->mFrame[packet->mFrameSize++] = mFifo.buffer[prevHead];
00234             //increment prevHead and wrap around to 0 if goes past FIFO boundaries
00235             prevHead = ( prevHead >= ( mFifo.size - 1 ) ) ? 0 : prevHead + 1;
00236         }
00237 
00238         Logger::logRawData( packet, FALSE );
00239         // checksum is 2's complement of sum of all the data...we calculated checksum
00240         // as just the sum, so if we add them together they should be zero
00241         if( packet->mChecksum != 0 )
00242         {
00243             // Invalid checksum; send NAK and keep looking for a packet.
00244             if( mTransportLayer )
00245             {
00246                 mTransportLayer->tx
00247                     (
00248                     new GarminPacket( ID_NAK_BYTE, &packet->mPacketId, sizeof( packet->mPacketId ) ),
00249                     TRUE
00250                     );
00251             }
00252             delete packet;
00253             mFifo.head = payloadStart;
00254             continue;
00255         }
00256         else
00257         {
00258             if( mTransportLayer )
00259             {
00260                 // Send ACK (if required) and push the packet up the stack for processing.
00261                 // ACK and NAK packets must not be ACKed.
00262                 if( packet->mPacketId != ID_ACK_BYTE &&
00263                     packet->mPacketId != ID_NAK_BYTE )
00264                     mTransportLayer->tx( new GarminPacket( ID_ACK_BYTE, &packet->mPacketId, sizeof( packet->mPacketId ) ), TRUE );
00265                 mTransportLayer->rx( packet );
00266             }
00267             delete packet;
00268         }
00269         incrementHead( SIZE_OF_FOOTER );
00270         return true;
00271     }
00272     return false;
00273 }  /* getPacketFromFifo */
00274 
00275 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00285 void GarminLinkLayer::getDataFromFifo
00286     (
00287     uint8  * aData,
00288     uint32   aSize
00289     )
00290 {
00291     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00292     Local Variables
00293     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00294     int wrapSize;
00295 
00296     if( ( mFifo.head + aSize ) < mFifo.size )
00297     {
00298         memcpy( &aData[0], &mFifo.buffer[mFifo.head], aSize );
00299     }
00300     else
00301     {
00302         wrapSize = mFifo.size - mFifo.head;
00303         memmove( &aData[0], &mFifo.buffer[mFifo.head], wrapSize );
00304         memmove( &aData[ wrapSize ], &mFifo.buffer[0], aSize - wrapSize );
00305     }
00306 } /* getDataFromFifo() */
00307 
00308 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00315 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00316 void GarminLinkLayer::incrementHead
00317     (
00318     uint32 const aIncrement
00319     )
00320 {
00321     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00322     Local Variables
00323     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00324     uint32          i;
00325 
00326     i = mFifo.head + aIncrement;
00327 
00328     if( mFifo.tail > mFifo.head )
00329     {
00330         if( i <= mFifo.tail )
00331         {
00332             mFifo.head = i;
00333         }
00334         else
00335         {
00336             mFifo.head = mFifo.tail;
00337         }
00338     }
00339     else if( mFifo.tail < mFifo.head )
00340     {
00341         if( i < mFifo.size )
00342         {
00343             mFifo.head = i;
00344         }
00345         else
00346         {
00347             i -= mFifo.size;
00348             if( i<mFifo.tail )
00349             {
00350                 mFifo.head = i;
00351             }
00352             else
00353             {
00354                 mFifo.head = mFifo.tail;
00355             }
00356         }
00357     }
00358 }    /* incrementHead() */
00359 
00360 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00366 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 bool GarminLinkLayer::tx
00368     (
00369     Packet * aPacket
00370     )
00371 {
00372     GarminPacket * thePacket = dynamic_cast<GarminPacket *>( aPacket );
00373 
00374     ASSERT( thePacket != NULL );
00375 
00376     uint8  i;
00377     thePacket->mFrameSize           = 0;
00378 
00379     // Frame header (DLE)
00380     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = ID_DLE_BYTE;
00381 
00382     // Packet ID
00383     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mPacketId;
00384 
00385     // Payload size, DLE stuffing if necessary
00386     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mPayloadSize;
00387     if( thePacket->mPayloadSize == ID_DLE_BYTE )
00388     {
00389         thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mPayloadSize;
00390     }
00391 
00392     // Payload, DLE stuffing as necessary
00393     for( i = 0; i < thePacket->mPayloadSize; i++)
00394     {
00395         thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mPayload[i];
00396         if( thePacket->mPayload[i] == ID_DLE_BYTE )
00397         {
00398             thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mPayload[i];
00399         }
00400     }
00401 
00402     // Checksum, DLE stuffing if necessary
00403     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mChecksum;
00404     if( thePacket->mChecksum == ID_DLE_BYTE )
00405     {
00406         thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = thePacket->mChecksum;
00407     }
00408 
00409     // Frame footer (DLE and ETX bytes)
00410     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = ID_DLE_BYTE;
00411     thePacket->mFrame[ thePacket->mFrameSize++ ] = ID_ETX_BYTE;
00412 
00413     Logger::logRawData( thePacket );
00414 
00415     return mPhysicalLayer->tx( thePacket->mFrame, thePacket->mFrameSize );
00416 }
